role.descr: named entity being expressed // gene or gene products//
property of the existing name entity
location refering to organelle, cell or tissue

example.text: BD73 messenger RNA is expressed in a wide variety of tissues and cell lines.
example.arg: in a wide variety of tissues and cell lines

example.text: The pfl operon is expressed at high levels anaerobically.
Northern blot analysis reveals that BNIP3alpha is expressed ubiquitously in most human tissues.
